gameplay

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gameplay.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Game
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable

    The Game class is contains the main game loop which does all the drawing, as well as some gameplay logic.

    Author:
    Leonardo Siracusa, Chady Kamar, Rakinul Huq
    See Also:
    Player, Enemy, Brick, Concrete, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(Bomberman bomberman)

        Constructor that initializes a Game object which is used for starting a new game, thus setting the level to 1. It initializes all the game objects for level 1. It also initializes the number of lives and the timer.

        Parameters:
        bomberman - an object of Bomberman which contains the specifications regarding the GUI

      • Game

        public Game(int level,
            Bomberman bomberman)

        Constructor that initializes a Game object which is used for loading a previously unlocked level. It initializes the game objects to their default settings for that level. It also initializes the number of lives and the game timer.

        Parameters:
        level - an object of Level which contains the level to be loaded.
        bomberman - an object of Bomberman which contains GUI specifications.

      • Game

        public Game(Grid grid,
            Level level,
            Enemy enemy,
            Brick brick,
            Concrete concrete,
            PowerUps powerups,
            ExitWay exitway,
            Bomb bomb,
            Player player,
            int currentScore,
            int currentLevel,
            int currentLives,
            int timerPlaying,
            boolean flamePass,
            boolean bombPass,
            boolean wallPass,
            boolean detonate,
            Bomberman bomberman)

        Constructor that initializes a Game object which is used for loading a previously saved game. It initializes the game objects to to their saved state. It also initializes the number of lives and the game timer to their saved states.

        Parameters:
        grid - an object of Grid which contains the grid on which game objects will be placed
        level - an object of Level which contains the level to be loaded
        enemy - an object of Enemy which contains information regarding enemies
        brick - an object of Brick which contains information regarding bricks
        concrete - an object of Concrete which contains information regarding concrete walls
        powerUps - an object of PowerUps which contains information regarding concrete walls
        exitWays - an object of Exitways which contains information regarding exitways
        bomb - an object of Bomb which contains information regarding bomb
        player - an object of Player which contains information regarding the player character
        currentScore - the player's score when the game was saved
        currentLevel -
        currentLives - the player's number of lives when the game was saved
        timer - the time left when the game was saved
        flamePass - true if the player has the flame-pass power up
        bombPass - true if the player has the bomb-pass power up
        wallPass - true if the player has the wall-pass power up
        detonate - true if the player has the detonator power up
        bomberman - an object of Bomberman which contains GUI specification

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Method that initializes all the game objects, namely Level, Brick, Exitway, Concrete, Player, Enemy, Bomb, Exitway, Powerups. It also initializes the object Timer.

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        This method is the main game loop. It repaints the grid based on a timer player movement, and player position (camera). It also does bomb collisions.
        Overrides:
        paint in class javax.swing.JComponent

      • powerupPrint

        public void powerupPrint(int i,
                         int j)
        Method to print the appropriate powerup on the grid depending on which level the player is in
        Parameters:
        i -
        j -

      • setIsPlayerAlive

        public void setIsPlayerAlive(java.lang.Boolean bool)
        Sets the status of the player to either alive or dead.
        Parameters:
        isPlayerAlive - true if the player character is still alive

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Method that reacts to player input. It will either call the move method for player and repaint if the player is trying to move, or bring up the pause
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

      • destroyPanel

        public void destroyPanel()
        Destroys the panel on which the game is being drawn.

      • setPauseMenuState

        public void setPauseMenuState(boolean isPauseMenuOpen)
        Sets the pause menu to open or closed
        Parameters:
        isPauseMenuOpen - true if pause menu is open

      • setTimeOverState

        public void setTimeOverState(boolean isTimeOverMenuOpen)
        Sets the state of the game over menu to either open or closed.
        Parameters:
        isGameOverMenuOpen - true if game over menu is open

      • getTimeOverState

        public java.lang.Boolean getTimeOverState()
        Gets the state of the game over menu which is open or closed.
        Returns:
        true if the game over menu is open
